publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-420 Mr Mark Ruskell: UNISON's NHS Food for Good Charter-That the Parliament endorses UNISON Scotland's NHS Food for Good Charter and believes that the charter represents a model for how public sector catering should address issues of public health promotion, environmental sustainability and animal welfare.
S2M-420 UNISON's NHS Food for Good Charter (lodged on 26 September 2003) Scott Barrie* R, Carolyn Leckie*, Frances Curran*
S2M-420 UNISON's NHS Food for Good Charter (lodged on 26 September 2003) Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-420 UNISON's NHS Food for Good Charter (lodged on 26 September 2003) Mark Ballard*, Dr Elaine Murray*
S2M-420 UNISON's NHS Food for Good Charter (lodged on 26 September 2003) Jackie Baillie*, Robert Brown*, Dr Jean Turner*, Linda Fabiani*, Robin Harper*, Margo MacDonald*
S2M-420 UNISON's NHS Food for Good Charter (lodged on 26 September 2003) Eleanor Scott*, Dr Sylvia Jackson*, Rosie Kane*, Alex Neil*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-420 UNISON's NHS Food for Good Charter (lodged on 26 September 2003) Chris Ballance*, Johann Lamont*
S2M-420 UNISON's NHS Food for Good Charter (lodged on 26 September 2003) Patrick Harvie*
S2M-420 UNISON's NHS Food for Good Charter (lodged on 26 September 2003) Margaret Jamieson*
S2M-420 UNISON's NHS Food for Good Charter (lodged on 26 September 2003) Elaine Smith*
S2M-420 UNISON's NHS Food for Good Charter (lodged on 26 September 2003) Colin Fox*
